item.title: Application of NB-IoT Network Based Real-time Environment Monitoring System in Crowdsourcing Mode
item.description:
My first journal paper “Application of NB-IoT Network Based Real-time Environment Monitoring System in Crowdsourcing Mode” has already been presented at Telecom Power Technology ðŸŽ‰.

This is my first publication and it was accepted during the second year of my undergraduate degree. It was the beginning of my research on IoT and hardware devices.

Abstract: Internet of Things equipment using Narrow Band Internet of Thingsï¼ˆNB-IoTï¼‰ technology usually have many advantages such as low cost,low power consumption and wide coverage. A Big data combining with crowdsourcing model and based on NB-IoT technology of embedded real-time environmental monitoring equipment are analyzed,can be used to warn and forecast natural and man-made disasters to a certain extent at low cost and low power consumption.

China National Knowledge Infrastructure (CNKI) is Now Available
